name: SaaS Companies - Segment
description: Target account list for Segment targeting modern SaaS companies with growth indicators
author: Segment Sales Team
description_long: This dataset contains 100 modern SaaS companies with comprehensive qualification agents for Segment's customer data platform. Includes hiring trends, funding signals, technical stack analysis, and market expansion indicators.
targetCustomer: Fast-growing SaaS companies with 100-5000 employees that need advanced customer data infrastructure
